00032     public function deleteUser($uid)
00033     {
00034         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00035         $sth = $pdo->prepare('DELETE FROM galleria.users WHERE id = ?');
00036         return $sth->execute(array($uid));
00037     }

00048     public function userActivity($uid, $act)
00049     {
00050         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00051         if ($act)
00052             $sth = $pdo->prepare('UPDATE galleria.users SET active = TRUE WHERE id = ? RETURNING id');
00053         else
00054             $sth = $pdo->prepare('UPDATE galleria.users SET active = FALSE WHERE id = ? RETURNING id');
00055         return ($sth->execute(array($uid))) ? $sth->fetchObject() : null;
00056     }

00084     {

00099     public function getGroupsFromUser($uid, $involves = true)
00100     {
00101         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00102         if ($involves) {
00103             $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT g.* FROM galleria.groups AS g WHERE g.id IN (SELECT ug.groupid FROM galleria.usergroups AS ug WHERE ug.userid = ?)');
00104         } else {
00105             $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT g.* FROM galleria.groups AS g WHERE g.id NOT IN (SELECT ug.groupid FROM galleria.usergroups AS ug WHERE ug.userid = ?)');
00106         }
00107         return ($sth->execute(array($uid))) ? $this->_fetchObjects($sth) : null;
00108     }
00109 
00119     public function saveCatGroups($groups, $catid)
00120     {
00121         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00122         $sth = $pdo->prepare('DELETE FROM galleria.categorygroups WHERE categoryid = ?');
00123         $status = $sth->execute(array($catid));
00124         foreach ($groups as $group) {
00125             $data = $this->_groupsToSqlString($catid, $group);
00126             $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00127             $sth = $pdo->prepare($data->sql);
00128             if ($sth->execute($data->params))
00129                 $status = true;
00130         }
00131         return $status;
00132     }

00178     public function saveCats($cats)
00179     {
00180         $status = true;
00181         foreach ($cats as $cat) {
00182             $data = $this->_catsToSqlString($cat);
00183             $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00184             $sth = $pdo->prepare($data->sql);
00185             if (!$sth->execute($data->params))
00186                 $status = false;
00187         }
00188         return $status;
00189     }

00230     {
00231         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00232         $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT goc.gid, goc.name, goc.adm FROM galleria.groupsofcategory AS goc WHERE goc.cid = ?');

00245     private function _catsToSqlString($cat)
00246     {
00247         return (object) array(
00248             'sql' => 'UPDATE galleria.categories SET parent = ?, weight = ? WHERE id = ?',
00249             'params' => array($cat->parent, $cat->weight, $cat->id)
00250         );
00251     }
00252 
00262     private function _groupsToSqlString($catid, $groupid)
00263     {
00264         return (object) array(
00265             'sql' => 'INSERT INTO galleria.categorygroups (categoryid, groupid) VALUES (?, ?)',
00266             'params' => array($catid, $groupid)
00267         );
00268     }

00281     public function changeDesc($pid, $text)
00282     {
00283         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00284         $sth = $pdo->prepare('UPDATE galleria.pictures SET description = ? WHERE id = ?');
00285         return ($sth->execute(array($text, $pid))) ? $this->_addChangelog(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getUid(), $pid, 'Changed description to "' . $text . '".') : false;
00286     }

00346     public function addTag($pid, $name)
00347     {
00348         if (!($tid = $this->_getTagId($name)))
00349             $tid = $this->_addNewTag($name);
00350         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00351         $sth = $pdo->prepare('INSERT INTO galleria.picturetags (pictureid, tagid) VALUES (?, ?) RETURNING tagid AS tid');
00352         return ($sth->execute(array($pid, $tid))) ? ((($obj = $sth->fetchObject()) && $this->_addChangelog(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getUid(), $pid, 'Added new tag "' . $name . '".')) ? $obj->tid : null) : null;
00353     }
00354 
00363     private function _addNewTag($name)
00364     {
00365         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00366         $sth = $pdo->prepare('INSERT INTO galleria.tags (name) VALUES (?) RETURNING id');
00367         return ($sth->execute(array($name))) ? (($obj = $sth->fetchObject()) ? $obj->id : null) : null;
00368     }
00369 
00378     private function _getTagId($name)
00379     {
00380         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00381         $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT t.id FROM galleria.tags AS t WHERE t.name = ?');
00382         return ($sth->execute(array($name))) ? (($obj = $sth->fetchObject()) ? $obj->id : null) : null;
00383     }
00384 
00394     public function pictureVisibility($pid, $show)
00395     {
00396         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00397         if ($show) {
00398             $sth = $pdo->prepare('UPDATE galleria.pictures SET shown = TRUE WHERE id = ?');
00399         } else {
00400             $sth = $pdo->prepare('UPDATE galleria.pictures SET shown = FALSE WHERE id = ?');
00401         }
00402         return ($sth->execute(array($pid))) ? $this->_addChangelog(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getUid(), $pid, 'Changed visibility to ' . (($show) ? 'shown' : 'hidden') . '.') : false;
00403     }
00404 
00415     public function deletePicTag($pid, $tid)
00416     {
00417         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00418         $sth = $pdo->prepare('DELETE FROM galleria.picturetags WHERE pictureid = ? AND tagid = ?');
00419         if ($sth->execute(array($pid, $tid))) {
00420             $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00421             $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT td.name FROM galleria.tagdata AS td WHERE td.tid = ?');
00422             if ($sth->execute(array($tid)) && ($obj = $sth->fetchObject()) && $this->_deleteEmptyTags()) {
00423                 return $this->_addChangelog(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getUid(), $pid, 'Removed tag ' . $obj->name . '.');
00424             } else
00425                 return false;
00426         } else
00427             return false;
00428     }
00429 
00437     private function _deleteEmptyTags()
00438     {
00439         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00440         $sth = $pdo->prepare('DELETE FROM galleria.tags WHERE id in (SELECT tid FROM galleria.tagdata WHERE weight = 0)');
00441         return $sth->execute();
00442     }
00443 
00452     public function deletePic($pid)
00453     {
00454         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00455         $sth = $pdo->prepare('DELETE FROM galleria.pictures WHERE id = ?');
00456         return ($sth->execute(array($pid)) && $this->_deleteEmptyTags());
00457     }

00467     public function getChangelog($pid)
00468     {
00469         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00470         $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT cl.user, cl.action, cl.timestamp FROM galleria.changelog AS cl WHERE pid = ? ORDER BY cl.timestamp');
00471         $sth->execute(array($pid));
00472         return $this->_fetchObjects($sth);
00473     }

00483     public function getPgs()
00484     {
00485         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00486         $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT p.photographer AS name FROM galleria.pictures AS p');
00487         $sth->execute(array());
00488         return $this->_fetchObjects($sth);
00489     }
